flawed_nl_solution:
Addison sold 181 x 2 = <<181*2=362>>362 raffle tickets on Saturday.
She sold 362 on Saturday - 78 on Sunday = <<362-78=824>>824 more on Saturday than Sunday.
#### 824

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 284, not 824. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
